name: Matzo Meal Latkes
recipeCategory: breakfast, brunch, dinner, easy, lunch, quick
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup whole wheat matzo meal (or 1 1/2 whole wheat matzos pulverized in a food processor

recipeInstructions.text: Mix matzo meal with 1/2 cup cold water. Let it soak for 2 to 3 minutes, then mix in wheat germ,  salt, sugar and cinnamon. Mix the egg yolks in well.

Put a 1/4 inch of oil in a pan over medium heat. Fold the egg whites into the batter. When the oil is hot, but not smoky, add the batter, a round tablespoon at a time. When well browned, flip and brown the other side, about 2 minutes per side. Drain quickly on paper towels and serve hot, with sugar, honey or plain.
